hint.throw: Press &control.invoke to toss the continuation trap
hint.captureThrown: Press &control.invoke again to capture a continuation from there
hint.modify:
&control.modify.verb&control.modify.space&control.modify.name to change the capture radius.

en.gameErrored: The game ran into a problem that it couldn't handle, and now it needs to be restarted.
en.gameErrorDetails: You can search for the error online:
en.move: Use &control.move to move and &control.jump to jump
en.climb: You can hold &control.climb and move to climb up a ladder
en.firstDoor:
To open the door, you will need to press
and hold the button...
if only you could do that...
en.button: Buttons trigger things while they are pressed
en.variable:
This is a variable.
Aim with &control.aim and
&control.interact.verb&control.interact.space&control.interact.name to grab it.
These will be very useful!
en.throwable: You can &control.throw.verb&control.throw.space&control.throw.name to throw the variable again -- the blue line shows where it will go.
en.firstContinuation:
That [green]green[/green] thing you are holding? It's a [special]continuation![/special]
Press &control.invoke to invoke it.
en.firstTrap:
With that [blue]blue[/blue] device, you can capture your own continuations!
Don't be shy -- grab it!
en.firstChallenge: There are a lot of race condition bugs... you'll have to use continuations to get around them.
en.noMoreHelp: There are more bugs, but I can't help you with them. Good luck!
en.fellOut:
Well, now you're in a pickle...
Continuations are your friend!
en.slightlyDifferent: This one behaves slightly differently... probably a good thing!
en.noSecret:
well, you found nothing

maybe the game will be updated...
en.congrats: [special]CONGRATULATIONS![/special] you have reached the end of the game so far!!
